kv1.2:9.3: Arahā arahattā parihāyamāno catūhi phalehi parihāyatīti?
kv1.2:10.1: ☒ Catūhi satasahassehi seṭṭhī seṭṭhittaṃ kārento satasahasse parihīne seṭṭhittā parihīno hotīti?
kv1.2:11.1: Catūhi satasahassehi seṭṭhī seṭṭhittaṃ kārento satasahasse parihīne bhabbo sabbasāpateyyā parihāyitunti?
kv1.2:11.3: Arahā arahattā parihāyamāno bhabbo catūhi phalehi parihāyitunti?
kv1.2:26.2: Hañci arahā arahattā parihāyamāno anāgāmiphale saṇṭhāti, anāgāmī anāgāmiphalā parihāyamāno sakadāgāmiphale saṇṭhāti, sakadāgāmī sakadāgāmiphalā parihāyamāno sotāpattiphale saṇṭhāti;
kv1.2:28.6: kassa bahutarā kilesā pahīnā arahato vā sotāpannassa vāti?
kv1.2:28.8: Hañci arahato bahutarā kilesā pahīnā, parihāyati arahā arahattā;
kv1.2:29.6: kassa bahutarā kilesā pahīnā arahato vā sakadāgāmissa vāti?
kv1.2:29.8: Hañci arahato bahutarā kilesā pahīnā, parihāyati arahā arahattā;
kv1.2:30.6: kassa bahutarā kilesā pahīnā arahato vā anāgāmissa vāti?
kv1.2:30.8: Hañci arahato bahutarā kilesā pahīnā, parihāyati arahā arahattā;
kv1.2:31.6: kassa bahutarā kilesā pahīnā anāgāmissa vā sotāpannassa vāti?
kv1.2:31.8: Hañci anāgāmissa bahutarā kilesā pahīnā, parihāyati anāgāmī anāgāmiphalā;
kv1.2:32.6: kassa bahutarā kilesā pahīnā anāgāmissa vā sakadāgāmissa vāti?
kv1.2:32.8: Hañci anāgāmissa bahutarā kilesā pahīnā, parihāyati anāgāmī anāgāmiphalā;
kv1.2:33.6: kassa bahutarā kilesā pahīnā sakadāgāmissa vā sotāpannassa vāti?
kv1.2:33.8: Hañci sakadāgāmissa bahutarā kilesā pahīnā, parihāyati sakadāgāmī sakadāgāmiphalā;
kv1.2:34.6: kassa adhimattā maggabhāvanā arahato vā sotāpannassa vāti?
kv1.2:34.8: Hañci arahato adhimattā maggabhāvanā, parihāyati arahā arahattā;
kv1.2:35.14: Hañci arahato adhimattā bojjhaṅgabhāvanā, parihāyati arahā arahattā;

kv1.2:41.3: Sotāpannena dukkhaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, parihāyati sotāpanno sotāpattiphalāti?

kv1.2:96.3: Nanu arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammoti?
kv1.2:96.5: Hañci arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.2:97.12: anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammanti?
kv1.2:97.14: Hañci arahato anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.2:98.5: Hañci arahato rāgappahānāya maggo bhāvito, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.2:99.3: Nanu arahato rāgappahānāya satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā … pe …
kv1.2:99.11: Hañci arahato rāgappahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.2:100.9: Hañci arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.2:101.3: Nanu arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṃkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto suvijitavijayo;
kv1.2:101.4: dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātaṃ, samudayo pahīno, nirodho sacchikato, maggo bhāvito, abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññātaṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātaṃ, pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikatanti?
kv1.2:101.6: Hañci arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv1.2:101.8: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.2:102.2: () Samayavimutto arahā arahattā parihāyati, asamayavimutto arahā arahattā na parihāyatīti.
kv1.2:104.1: Samayavimuttassa arahato rāgo pahīno, parihāyati samayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:104.3: Asamayavimuttassa arahato rāgo pahīno, parihāyati asamayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:105.3: anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ, parihāyati samayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:105.5: Asamayavimuttassa arahato anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ, parihāyati asamayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:106.1: Samayavimuttassa arahato rāgappahānāya maggo bhāvito, parihāyati samayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:106.3: Asamayavimuttassa arahato rāgappahānāya maggo bhāvito, parihāyati asamayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:107.1: Samayavimuttassa arahato rāgappahānāya satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā … pe …
kv1.2:107.7: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, parihāyati samayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:107.9: Asamayavimuttassa arahato rāgappahānāya satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā … pe …
kv1.2:107.11: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, parihāyati asamayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:108.5: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, parihāyati samayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:108.7: Asamayavimuttassa arahato anottappaṃ pahānāya maggo bhāvito … pe …
kv1.2:108.9: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, parihāyati asamayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:109.1: Samayavimutto arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṃkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto suvijitavijayo, dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātaṃ, samudayo pahīno, nirodho sacchikato, maggo bhāvito, abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññātaṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātaṃ, pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, parihāyati samayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:109.3: Asamayavimutto arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv1.2:109.5: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, parihāyati asamayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:110.1: Asamayavimuttassa arahato rāgo pahīno, na parihāyati asamayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:110.3: Samayavimuttassa arahato rāgo pahīno, na parihāyati samayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:111.3: anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ, na parihāyati asamayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:111.5: Samayavimuttassa arahato anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ, na parihāyati samayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:112.1: Asamayavimuttassa arahato rāgappahānāya maggo bhāvito … pe …
kv1.2:112.3: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, na parihāyati asamayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:112.5: Samayavimuttassa arahato rāgappahānāya maggo bhāvito … pe …
kv1.2:112.7: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, na parihāyati samayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:113.5: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, na parihāyati asamayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:113.7: Samayavimuttassa arahato anottappapahānāya maggo bhāvito … pe …
kv1.2:113.9: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, na parihāyati samayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:114.1: Asamayavimutto arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv1.2:114.3: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, na parihāyati asamayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:114.5: Samayavimutto arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho … pe …
kv1.2:114.7: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, na parihāyati samayavimutto arahā arahattāti?
kv1.2:116.3: Hañci sāriputto thero na parihāyittha arahattā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.2:117.7: Hañci mahāpanthako thero na parihāyittha arahattā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.2:133.5: “pañcime, bhikkhave, dhammā samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattanti.
kv1.2:133.7: Kammārāmatā, bhassārāmatā, niddārāmatā, saṅgaṇikārāmatā, yathāvimuttaṃ cittaṃ na paccavekkhati.
kv1.2:133.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
kv1.2:135.3: Atthi arahato rāgo kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti?
kv1.2:136.1: Atthi arahato bhassārāmatā, atthi arahato niddārāmatā, atthi arahato saṅgaṇikārāmatāti?
kv1.2:137.3: Atthi arahato rāgo kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti?
kv1.2:138.3: Arahā arahattā parihāyamāno kiṃ pariyuṭṭhito parihāyatīti?
kv1.2:139.3: Atthi arahato kāmarāgānusayo paṭighānusayo mānānusayo diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayoti?
kv1.2:142.3: Arahato arahattā parihāyamānassa kiṃ upacayaṃ gacchatīti?
kv1.2:142.5: Sakkāyadiṭṭhi upacayaṃ gacchatīti, vicikicchā upacayaṃ gacchatīti, sīlabbataparāmāso upacayaṃ gacchatīti?
kv1.2:142.9: moho upacayaṃ gacchatīti, sakkāyadiṭṭhi upacayaṃ gacchatīti, vicikicchā upacayaṃ gacchatīti, sīlabbataparāmāso upacayaṃ gacchatīti?
kv1.2:144.1: Nanu arahā nevācinati na apacinati apacinitvā ṭhitoti?
kv1.2:144.3: Hañci arahā nevācinati na apacinati apacinitvā ṭhito, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.2:145.1: Nanu arahā neva pajahati na upādiyati pajahitvā ṭhitoti?
kv1.2:145.3: Hañci arahā neva pajahati na upādiyati pajahitvā ṭhito, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.2:146.1: Nanu arahā neva visineti na ussineti visinitvā ṭhitoti?
kv1.2:146.3: Hañci arahā neva visineti na ussineti visinitvā ṭhito, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv1.2:147.1: Nanu arahā neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti vidhūpetvā ṭhitoti?
kv1.2:147.3: Hañci arahā neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti vidhūpetvā ṭhito, no ca vata re vattabbe—
